entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
